titles.title: I've Got Something To Thank God For, I Am Glad

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've got something to thank God for, I am glad. (Repeat 3x.)
Thank you, Father, I am glad.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I've got Jesus to thank God for, I am glad. (Repeat 3x.)
Thank you, Father, I am glad.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I've got the Word to thank God for, I am glad. (Repeat 3x.)
Thank you, Father, I am glad.
